alert.note: Alert for Beaufort; Martin; Pitt (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 01 at 4:43PM EDT until August 01 at 5:30PM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Newport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Pitt County in eastern North Carolina... South central Martin County in eastern North Carolina... Northwestern Beaufort County in eastern North Carolina... * Until 530 PM EDT. * At 443 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Pitt Greenville Airport, or near Greenville, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Greenville, Washington, River Road, Pactolus, Bunyan, Old Ford, Chocowinity, Washington Park, Grimesland and Simpson. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please send your reports of hail and/or wind damage, including trees or large limbs downed, by calling the National Weather Service office in Newport at 1-800-889-6889.
